text: And many sufferers donâ€™t know the cause or thesolution  to their problem. The majority of our patients at the clinic  tend  to be women. They are especially vulnerable  because of pregnancy but also because of osteoporosis  which I personally believe to be the major cause of problems for women. I have many women patients who say they have completely given up exercise because the pain makes them somiserable  But of course that starts up a vicious  circle.
